author: martinc
msg: Change the default for the 'locale' attribute of the <controller> element
to be 'true' rather than 'false', for compatibility with Struts 1.0.x.

author: martinc
msg: Update for Struts 1.1 Release Candidate 1 build.

author: dmkarr
msg: Changed all Struts-EL tag attributes to be fronted by a "shadow" attribute,
with the same name, but using different getter/setter methods, pointed to by an
associated BeanInfo class.  This is done to allow for the possibility for web
containers to omit redundant calls to attribute setters for reused tag
